our story

Sarah and Peter met while both out with their groups of friends at a bar in Montreal. After catching each otherâ€™s eye across the room and spending the rest of the night finding out how much they have in common, they started dating. Two years later, we're best friends, true loves, and badass partners in life. We're finally ready to make it official!

our story

The soon to be married couple came from opposite sides of the world. They met each other by fate in a city and instantly fell in love. They travelled to so many places in the world and their love for each other depened. After living together for years, they decided to commit and to officialize their union to remain together for the rest of their lives.
